full_output.summary: Hello, I'm Amey Sawant, a passionate web developer with a strong foundation in the MERN stack, encompassing ReactJS, Node.js, MongoDB, and Express.js. My expertise is in designing frontend pages that are basic yet attractive and deliver a consistent user experience. But it's the amazing realms of augmented reality and virtual reality that genuinely fascinate me, not my technological skills. I'm confident that these cutting-edge technologies will change the way we connect with the outside world and provide us with a plethora of opportunities to enhance our lives. I have also worked as an intern at CareLink as a Frontend Developer. I am entirely immersed in researching the most recent trends and technologies in the web development market in order to stay ahead of the curve. I'm also interested in augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR), Gen AI and I'm continually searching for ways to progress these technologies and leverage their potential to serve society. Join me on this journey as we explore the incredible possibilities that lie ahead!

projects.name: Video Chat App
projects.description: This is a video chatting web application that can be used for peer-to-peer communication. The project can be accessed from any device also its hosted on the web.
projects.url: Link to the project is given on github.

projects.name: Amazon Clone
projects.description: Amazon Clone with Stripe i.e. we can do payment. We can buy and add products to the basket and do payouts. To see the project you can refer to the given link or github profile, to see the whole project backend then contact me due to security reasons. As this project is made using React.js so paging & navigation is demonstrated.

projects.name: HouseHaven
projects.description: A Real-estate marketplace website. We can add property for sale or buy someone's property using the website as a middleware to see the type of property and get its details, using which we contact the owner/saler for buying, etc.. This project was made in MERN stack.

projects.name: GYM Management System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive gym management system using Django, featuring robust user authentication, dynamic workout tracking, and integrated payment monitoring. This project leverages Django Rest Framework, Bootstrap, and jQuery to deliver a scalable and user-friendly solution for fitness center operations.

full_output.name: AMEY SAWANT
achievements_and_awards: Runner up in internal hackathon at Vidyalankar Polytechnic, 2022
